1.Name: Now, soup
1.Text: Now, we are going to cook a vegetable soup

2.Name: Olive oil
2.Text: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat

2.1.Name: Interject
2.1.Text: If you don't have olive oil, you can use butter

2.2.Name: Abrupt
2.2.Text: Replacing olive oil with butter, remembert to ...

3.Name: Onions
3.Text: Add the onions and season with salt and pepper

4.Name: Simmer, and add veg
4.Text: Let simmer for 3 minutes, then add the garlic, carrot, celery, and zucchini

5.Name: Season and simmer
5.Text: Season with some more salt and pepper and let simmer for 6 minutes, stirring frequently.

6.Name: color
6.Text: You want the vegetables to pick up just a little color.

7.Name: If thicker
7.Text: If you want a thicker soup, drain and rinse the cannellini beans and then either puree or mash half of them.

8.Name: Add cannellini et al
8.Text: Add the cannellini beans, bell pepper, tomatoes, and oregano to the pot and let simmer for 3-4 minutes.

9.Name: Broth
9.Text: Pour the broth into the pot and bring to a slow boil.

10.Name: swiss chard
10.Text: Once the broth is slowly bubbling, add the swiss chard.

11.Name: Cook for 15
11.Text: Cover the pot and let the dumplings cook for 15-20 minutes.
